n, k = map(int, input().split())
t = input()

s = ''

for i in range(k):
    s += t

print(s)

import fileinput

def main():
    n, k = map(int, fileinput.input()[0].split())
    t = fileinput.input()[0]
    print(t * (k // n) + t[:k % n])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n, k = map(int, input().split())
t = input()

if k < n:
    print(t[:k])
else:
    k -= n
    print(t + t[:k])

import sys

def main():
    input = sys.stdin.readline
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    t = input().strip()
    s = t
    for _ in range(k-1):
        s += t[1:]
    print(s)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
